backend/main.mo: Actor defining domain types, access control mixin usage, and in‑memory maps for categories, products, garden centers, orders, and user profiles with helper functions for search and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: JSON placeholder for feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing layouts, pages, components, and theme configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark theme color tokens and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with favicon links.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, ThemeProvider, CartProvider, and root layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card showing an access‑denied message with optional principal ID and a button back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth with fallback retry logic and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Card showing the user’s principal ID with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper enforcing platform‑admin access, showing loading skeletons or an access‑denied screen as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children with a login prompt when the user is not authenticated using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Ensures the user is authenticated and has a customer role, showing loading skeletons or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Checks authentication and garden center membership or admin role before rendering children, otherwise shows loading or access denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Restricts access to platform admins, displaying skeletons or an access denied screen with principal ID when unauthorized.
Defines the main app layout with a header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media links with icons for WhatsApp, Instagram, and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site's footer with brand info, quick links, and contact methods.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation, portals, admin links, and user-specific options.
Shows a small badge with the number of cart items when the cart is not empty.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product preview card with image, name, description, price, and stock status.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder toggle function with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Queries active products for a specific garden center by filtering all active products from the backend.
Admin hooks for listing garden centers (placeholder) and adding/removing/enabling team members, with several backend methods not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Provides mutations to grant or revoke platform admin access via actor calls and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role and provides a helper to check platform admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Loads the authenticated user's profile through the actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Queries whether the caller is an admin using actor.isCallerAdmin().
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Mutation hook to save the caller's user profile and invalidate profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a new garden center through the actor and invalidates related role and center queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Fetches and filters active products per garden center and provides mutations for adding or updating products, with some backend stubs.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Loads the caller's primary garden center using role info and returns a placeholder until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates garden center details through the actor and invalidates relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Retrieves user orders but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Mutation for placing an order, currently unimplemented and always errors due to backend stub.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches all categories from the backend via actor.getCategories().
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Loads the full category taxonomy tree from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches a single product by ID using actor.getProduct().
Provides hooks to fetch active products, products by category, and client-side search results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and triggers query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup with custom options and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with an earthy green palette. Includes global styling and a custom container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and InternetIdentity providers. Loads global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface for viewing, expanding, and managing garden centers and their members, including removal, enabling, disabling, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Admin page for adding or removing platform admin Principal IDs with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for adding products, toggling product active status, initializing seed data, and viewing existing active products.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI with item quantity controls, removal, totals, and an empty-state view. Integrates with cart store actions for updates and clearing.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with search, category filters, and hierarchical taxonomy browsing. Fetches products and categories and filters results client-side.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows an order summary and handles order placement, requiring authentication via Internet Identity. Navigates to confirmation on success and blocks checkout if cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with a hero banner, feature cards, and top-level categories. Loads category taxonomy to display main category links.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays a user's order history with statuses, product lines, totals, and loading or empty states, wrapped in auth protection.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Dashboard for garden center members to view and edit garden center details and manage products, including adding images and assigning categories.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows an order confirmation message and optional order ID, with navigation to orders or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Redirects authenticated customers to the catalog and shows loading or access-denied states based on role.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Handles nursery user onboarding, redirecting existing members to the dashboard or allowing new users to register a garden center.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Checks for platform admin access and redirects to the admin nursery list or shows access-denied and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with images, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart functionality, handling loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart state and actions with persistence to localStorage, including add, update, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Implements versioned cart persistence in localStorage with load, save, and clear functions.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for cart items, cart state, actions, and context type.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Hook for accessing the cart context, enforcing usage within CartProvider.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions for flattening category taxonomies, retrieving descendants, and detecting leaf or specific category nodes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the GreenPlantz web and mobile app.
